FuncDef: The display bgp mvpn all update-peer-group command displays information about update peer-groups. The display bgp mvpn all update-peer-group command displays information about update peer-groups.
CLIs: display bgp mvpn all update-peer-group [ index <update-group-index> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the index of an update peer-group.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.
